segments.text: I observe the kitchen layout with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, towel in hand, drying carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running, basin full, overflow starting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming under her, but she continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, open cabinet with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the two-step stool, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool looks unsteady, legs spread out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, arm up, palm open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above sink shows a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, light coming in nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter, ready to put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene feels everyday, despite the little issues.
segments.speaker: PAR
